subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: I was 6 when I first saw Yankee Stadium on TV. My father had died of cancer that year, and I’d been wandering around our house like a lost soul, longing for something to hang on to.
snippet: I was 6 when I first saw Yankee Stadium on TV. My father had died of cancer that year, and I’d been wandering around our house like a lost soul, longing for something to hang on to.
